meanings.definition: Skillful in a quick, sure, and easy way.
meanings.sent1: Her deftnesses moves in the dance impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The artist's deftnesses brush strokes brought the painting to life.
meanings.sent3: With deftnesses precision, he assembled the puzzle in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her deftnesses handling of the situation was like watching a master at work.
meanings.sent5: The chef's deftnesses knife skills were mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The quality of being skillful and clever in handling difficult situations or tasks.
meanings.sent1: His deftnesses in problem-solving made him the go-to person in the office.
meanings.sent2: The magician's deftnesses with cards amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The detective used his deftnesses to solve the mystery in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her deftnesses in negotiation were unmatched in the business world.
meanings.sent5: The pilot's deftnesses in landing the plane safely saved many lives.
